description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              * Major Responsibilities And Authority:
              
              - Calculate the amount used of raw material
              
              - Analysis FCST and BOM of product
              
              - Make a Purchase Order when it need
              
              - Management delivery time of raw material
              
              - Management of raw material stock

requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              * Experience Required:
              
              Minimum 1 years of experience in foreign invested manufacturing company.
              
              Fresh candidates can be accepted
              

              * Knowledge’s Skills And Abilities:
              
              - Fluent English communication skills
              
              - Good communication & presentation skills
              

              * Education:
              
              Bachelors degree.
